title: Mutual Learning-Based Education Program for Understanding Dementia and Building Community [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational neuroscience or knowledge related to elderly health
context.additional_context: Program emphasizing awareness improvement and acquisition of practical strategies for building dementia-friendly societies

learning_goals: Learners empathetically understand the daily difficulties of dementia patients and can propose at least three practical support measures.
Participants demonstrate a positive attitude change that improves social biases related to dementia by at least 20%.
Learners can perform at least three effective communication simulations from the perspectives of dementia patients and caregivers through scenario-based role-playing.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
